actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."utenti" SET
		"telefono" = '{{update_form.fieldState.telefono.isVisible ? update_form.formData.telefono : update_form.sourceData.telefono}}',
		"nome" = '{{update_form.fieldState.nome.isVisible ? update_form.formData.nome : update_form.sourceData.nome}}',
    "cognome" = '{{update_form.fieldState.cognome.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cognome : update_form.sourceData.cognome}}',
		"datanascita" = '{{update_form.fieldState.datanascita.isVisible ? update_form.formData.datanascita : update_form.sourceData.datanascita}}',
		"mail" = '{{update_form.fieldState.mail.isVisible ? update_form.formData.mail : update_form.sourceData.mail}}',
		"lavoraper" = '{{update_form.fieldState.lavoraper.isVisible ? update_form.formData.lavoraper : update_form.sourceData.lavoraper}}'
WHERE "cf" = '{{data_table.selectedRow.cf}}';
